      • poll

        public java.lang.String poll(java.lang.String fN,
                    java.lang.String subId,
                    java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> extHdr,
                    java.lang.String bTime,
                    java.lang.String eTime,
                    java.util.Set<java.lang.String> cBind,
                    java.lang.String dsSig)
        Returns a String containing a TAXII XML response - the results from the poll
        Parameters:
        fN - feed name
        subId - the subscription id
        extHdr - a HashMap containing all extended headers (can be null)
        bTime - an exclusive begin timestamp
        eTime - an inclusive end timestamp
        Returns:
        String containing the TAXII XML Poll_Response message
